title: Experimental Economic Learning Design for Mitigating Virtual Bias

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Virtual bias reduction training program applying experimental economics methodologies in digital blended learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain causes and impacts of hypothetical bias in the contingent valuation (CV) method
Learners can identify response differences between real payment and hypothetical scenarios in sequential voting experiments with 80% accuracy
Learners can propose measures to reduce hypothetical bias in public goods valuation by over 50% using Learning Design
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
